channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Several potholes down Wellington Lane, 1st April
item.description:
Between Wellington Square and Evesham Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Camargue House, 32 Wellington Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large & deep pothole on St Pauls Road, near Marle Hill Parade Junction, 1st April
item.description:
The recent rain has enlarged the pothole so that it is very wide & deep. Lots of loose gravel coming out of it as cars go through it & flying gravel debris up at pedestrians walking past.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 37 Saint Paul's Street North, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep potholes, 1st April
item.description:
I have reported this stretch of road several times but the deterioration continues. This stretch of road is disintegrating and is now in a really bad state.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Grove Road, Churchdown

item.title: Deep Pothole, 1st April
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9 Willersey Road, Cheltenham

item.title: 4ft pot hole and 2ft pot hole outside 48, Swindon Lane, Cheltenham, 1st April
item.description:
This pot hole has been here since at least a year. The pothole hole has suddenly expanded because of what appears to be a failure in the top layers of tarmac. With so much debris being lifted it is in danger of causing damage to vehicles and pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Lyndon Swindon Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep potholes on Harp Hill, 1st April
item.description:
They are several deep potholes on Harp Hill, Cheltenham. They are from just above the junction with Oakley Road down towards the Battledown Centre for Children They are deep enough to bring a cyclist off their bike
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Harp Hill, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple very large potholes, 1st April

item.title: Deep flooding due to blocked drain, 1st April
item.description:
Deep water in road and entering onto driveway due to a blocked drain in the road. This happens every time there is rain. The flooding is getting closer to entering properties every time this happens. Itâ€™s been reported before but was never fixed. It needs someone to come out and fix the problem asap before property gets damaged

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9 Glamorgan Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
